column4: there is a solution to the "windows rebooted during ubuntu install"
how many sodding times will it run update-grub ffs..
i can't fix this?  i have to reinstall ubuntu?
boot from recovery, run install-grub or similar
i can't  boot from recovery, i get the same error
well i can get a console root@mycomputer if i press "M" for manual recovery
oh i found that "grub-install" works, but it says "INSTALL_DEVICE can be a GRUB device name or a system device filename" .. what should i do?
it says "cannot remove /boot/grub/915resolution.mod - it is a read only file system"
it says it can't find /dev/sda in fstab when i do that
it says it can't find /dev/sda in fstab when i do that
i tried dev/sda1 up to 10 and it said the same thing for all of them
